data.fieldValue: Create a list of questions for the visit
We've put together a list of relevant questions to use during your school visit. the questions you select will ne available for you to answer during the school visit.

data.title: Find a date that works for your schedule
data.subTitle: Note: Each school(s) should have information on how to schedule a tour.

data.title: Tip: Some schools also offer department tours which can be very insightful if you already have a good idea on your area of study
If the school is far enough that this isn't a day trip don't forget to make your travel and lodging arrangements
